metaDescription: Click the button and make everything OK. A satirical website that lets you fix your life with a single click. Free and premium versions available.
metaKeywords: make everything ok, fix everything, life problems, satirical website, stress relief, one click solution
ogTitle: allgood.click - Make Everything OK With One Click
ogDescription: The button that makes everything OK. Because sometimes we all wish life had a simple fix-it button.
languageSuggestion: This page is also available in English
loadingText: Making everything OK for you now...
loadingTextPremium: Making everything really OK for you now...
successSubtext:
Not really OK yet?
Click again.
paymentSelectionText: The free OK is cool. The paid one goes all the way.
subscriptionExplainer:
Every Friday at 1pm we make everything OK.
Relax and start your weekend worry-free.
paymentModalText:
Get way more okayness (we promise).
Only {currency}/one-time.
thankYouText: We promise. For real this time.
faqCancelSubscription: How can I cancel my subscription?

faq.whatIsAnswer: allgood.click is a satirical website that lets you click a button to 'make everything OK'. It's a playful reminder that sometimes we all wish life had a simple fix-it button. The premium version is an ironic joke - because obviously clicking harder won't solve your real problems. But hey, at least you'll get a good laugh!
faq.cancelQuestion: How can I cancel my subscription?
faq.cancelAnswer: Enter your email address to access your subscription management portal where you can cancel your subscription.

manageSub.headline: Manage Your Subscription
manageSub.description: Enter your email address to access your subscription management portal.
manageSub.successMessage: A portal link has been sent to your email. Click the link to manage your subscription.
manageSub.errorNoCustomer: No active subscriptions found for this email.
manageSub.errorGeneral: An error occurred. Please try again.
